DOC.brief_title: Safety Study hMN14 Treat Either Colorectal Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Disease Characteristics : Histologic cytologic diagnosis either , colonic , rectal , breast carcinoma Measurable lesion diagnose CT scan Recurrent/metastatic disease consider surgically unresectable . Prior/Concurrent Therapy : Chemotherapy : Patients either fail least one regimen standard systemic therapy , clinically asymptomatic presently consider chemotherapy ( Enrollment must occur least 4 week beyond last treatment ) Other : Prior treatment investigational agent exclude unless followup complete patient study Patient Characteristics/ Performance Status : Patients Karnofsky performance status > 70 % ( equivalent , ECOG 01 ) expect survival least 3 month . Hematopoietic : WBC > /= 3000 mm3 , neutrophils > /= 1500 mm3 , platelet > /= 75,000 , CEA < 300 ng/mL Hepatic : Serum bilirubin < /= 2.0 mg/dL , ALT < 2.5 x IULN Cardiovascular : Patients LVEF > /= 40 % require MUGA/2DECHO study . Pulmonary : Patients FEV1 > /= 60 % require Pulmonary Function Tests Other : Patients agree use medically effective method contraception period 3 month treatment period . A pregnancy test preform premenopausal female childbearing potential immediately prior entry study . Patients able understand give write informed consent . Patients significant concurrent medical condition could affect patient 's ability tolerate complete study .
